page.title: 16W.I. members survey
page.content: A survey of fifty women belonging to the Womens Institute in the area produced the following infomation:- { ORGANISATIONS:(Local)}Keep Fit, W.I., Mothers Union, Sports Club, Badminton, Guides, Amateur Dramatic Society, O.A.P. Club and Conservative Association. {(Non-local)}R.S.P.B., Wildfowl Trust, National Trust, Flower Clubs, N.F.U., Altrusa and Doll Clubs. { HOBBIES & PASTIMES:}Sewing, Knitting, Walking, Needlework, Gardening, Sports, Reading, Music, Painting, Flower arranging and Amateur Dramatics. {FUND RAISING:}In aid of the village halls, Treat Committee, Churches and Sports Clubs are well supported. {ANNUAL EVENTS:}Bonfire Night, Carol Services, Sports Club Dances, Flower & Produce shows and Whist Drives.
